outline:
1. desire
    1. desire, wish, longings of one's heart
      1. lust, appetite, covetousness (bad sense)
    2. thing desired, object of desire
kjv_def: dainty, desire, [idiom] exceedingly, [idiom] greedily, lust(ing), pleasant. See also H6914 (קִבְרוֹת הַתַּאֲוָה).
strongs_def: a longing; by implication, a delight (subjectively, satisfaction, objectively, a charm)
